title: Update build tools. (#45)
message:
Update build tools. (#45)

Upgrade build tools.

title: Add share format hint and fix a bug. (#43)
message:
Add share format hint and fix a bug. (#43)

The bug crashes the app if the providing share path is "\".

This fixes #16 and #22.

title: Merge pull request #38 from rthakohov/browsing-list
message:
Merge pull request #38 from rthakohov/browsing-list

Browsing list

title: Move browsing functionality to the launch activity
message:
Move browsing functionality to the launch activity

The input for share URI has a drop-down list displaying discovered
shares.

title: Merge pull request #34 from rthakohov/eject-root
message:
Merge pull request #34 from rthakohov/eject-root

Eject root

title: Support root ejection
message:
Support root ejection

Provides a control to unmount shares pinned to the left pane of the
Files App.

This fixes #3.

title: Merge pull request #32 from rthakohov/credential-encryption
message:
Merge pull request #32 from rthakohov/credential-encryption

Credential encryption

title: Implmenet credential encryption
message:
Implmenet credential encryption

Encrypt server credentials using Android KeyStore rather than storing
them in plain text.

This fixes #33.

title: Merge pull request #31 from rthakohov/authentication
message:
Merge pull request #31 from rthakohov/authentication

Authentication on demand

title: Implement on-demand authentication
message:
Implement on-demand authentication

Add the UI and logic to ask for credentials if the user tries to access a protected share while browsing. Give an option of just authenticating and saving the credentials for future use or also pinning the share to the left pane.

title: Add prerequisite on Ubuntu
message:
Add prerequisite on Ubuntu

To avoid future confusion on building on other platforms.

title: Merge pull request #29 from rthakohov/identation-fix
message:
Merge pull request #29 from rthakohov/identation-fix

Fix identation in SambaDocumentsProvider

title: Fix identation in SambaDocumentsProvider
message: Fix identation in SambaDocumentsProvider

title: Merge pull request #28 from rthakohov/network-browsing-broadcast
message:
Merge pull request #28 from rthakohov/network-browsing-broadcast

Network browsing via broadcasting

title: Support network browsing via NetBIOS broadcast
message:
Support network browsing via NetBIOS broadcast

If the master browsing approach fails, use NetBIOS broadcast to discover
Samba servers as a fallback.

title: Network browsing (#25)
message:
Network browsing (#25)

Add basic network browsing support.

The embedded "master browser" functionality embedded in libsmbclient is the only way to browse as of now, but the code is structured to be extendable for other mechanisms of browsing.

This fixes #5.

title: Increase buffer size to 1MB. (#24)
message:
Increase buffer size to 1MB. (#24)

This should increase transmission speed in modern network settings.

title: Expose smb.conf to external storage. (#21)
message:
Expose smb.conf to external storage. (#21)

* Consolidate ShareManager into the unified init process.

* Remove misc.xml

* Expose smb.conf to external storage.

Some clean-up on initialization code. Fix a bug that doesn't restart SMB
client after configuration is updated.

* Use the right TAG.

* Guard a log behind debug flag.

title: Consolidate ShareManager into the unified init process.
message: Consolidate ShareManager into the unified init process.

title: Disable debug & verbose logging on release builds.
message: Disable debug & verbose logging on release builds.

title: Reconstruct the init process to make sure smb.conf is respected.
message:
Reconstruct the init process to make sure smb.conf is respected.

This fixes #18.

title: Call super.onCreate() in Application.
message:
Call super.onCreate() in Application.

Just in case Application#onCreate() does something, though as of now it
does nothing for real.

title: Stop building for Lollipop.
message:
Stop building for Lollipop.

This closes #13.

title: Allow SMBv3.
message:
Allow SMBv3.

SMBv2 is already enforced in previous commit.

This fixed #7.

title: Update NDK to use unified headers.
message:
Update NDK to use unified headers.

Fixed issue #11.

title: Fix a bug that doesn't pass maxLen to read.
message: Fix a bug that doesn't pass maxLen to read.

title: Set minimum protocol to SMB2 (#10)
message:
Set minimum protocol to SMB2 (#10)

This sets the default configuration to use at least SMB2, instead of defaulting to SMB1. You may want to look into the sub versions of SMB2 to see if this default is correct.

title: Fix a bug that exposes non-thread-safe access for reading dir.
message: Fix a bug that exposes non-thread-safe access for reading dir.

title: Plumb through notification when write finishes to O file descriptor.
message: Plumb through notification when write finishes to O file descriptor.

title: Some bug fixes and tiny improvements upon seekable files.
message: Some bug fixes and tiny improvements upon seekable files.

title: Separate directory loading into steps to avoid blocking samba thread.
message: Separate directory loading into steps to avoid blocking samba thread.

title: Implement seekability for file descriptors (#6)
message:
Implement seekability for file descriptors (#6)

* Implement seekability for file descriptors

title: Wrap MessageValues in try-resources.
message:
Wrap MessageValues in try-resources.

So that they will be recycled to reduce some GC pressure.

title: Change default project name & update README.
message: Change default project name & update README.

title: Initial commit.
message: Initial commit.
